comments:
Description:
  Can't preview when select two columns from dataset with same name 

Step to reproduce;
  1. new a Sample datasource and dataset
  2. In the data set query input "select CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMERNUMBER,CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS.CUSTOMERNUMBER
from CLASSICMODELS.CUSTOMERS"
  3. preview in the data set editor

Acutal result:
  a error happen:

org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: The new column name or alias CUSTOMERNUMBER is already used by the column at index 2

This bug is caused by the model's changes, since model has revert its code. This bug does not exist.

traces.message: The new column name or alias CUSTOMERNUMBER is already used by the column
